Sponsorship Proposal


Hackathons attract the most talented and passionate technical students

As a hack arizona sponsor, you not only have access to a dense collection of technical talent, but you also have the opportunity to engage future developers to use your platform or be a part of your organization in the near future.

Hosted at the University of Arizona, over 400 participants will build software and hardware projects from start to finish in under 36 hours amongst their peers, mentors and company sponsors.
